description.zh: 都市設計是一種整體性、全面性的思考，他包含了對都市內整體全般的活動記其所一存的實質環境安排，同時他也處理既有建成環境的成形及其與自然環境間的關係對應。並思考處身於其間的人們如何在社會與經濟的各種層面做出最適切的回應並具體呈現於空間裡。	故之，一個好的都市設計絕對不僅止於技術上的分析評估，他更關切於人們如何看待環境，如何面對環境思考，如何面對環境思考，與如何參與程式設計的成形。	這個專題將討論什麼是都市設計極其重要性，都市設計在現時處境下所面臨的挑戰，以及我們可以如何藉由都市設計創造一個可為適切的都市環境。
description.en: Urban Design should to be understood to apply to all scales of and types of urban activity and to be concerned about the physical arrangement and functioning of urban activities, the physical appearance of the built environment and its relationship to the natural environment, the way in which people experience it and the social and economic factors which influence its quality.	So achieving good urban design does not require that every decision maker becomes skilled in important design decision know what the people involved in important design decision know what to look for, the questions to ask, and have at least a rough idea of the criteria to consider.	This course will discuss urban design what is it and why is urban design important, what are the challenges, and how to setting our fundamental directions for achieving a more cohesive and satisfying environment.

description.zh: 自動化機械相關機電界面等技術問題，內容包括自動化機構、致動器、感測器、控制器等之原理介紹，並配合機電整合設備，使同學由實習中獲得機電整合之概念。
description.en: Interface Techniques Concerning Automatic Machinery; Subjects Include Theory and Application Know-How of Mechanisms, Actuators, Sensors, And Controllers; Experiments also provided.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 本課程分兩學期授課，第一學期教授國際標準驗證ISO9001:2008，第二學期教授ISO14001:2004及OHSAS18001:2007。上完課程獲得學分外，並可參加第三者驗證機構考試獲得稽核員之證書。
description.en: This course is given lesson for two semesters. The content of first semester is ISO9001:2008, second semester is ISO14001:2004 andOHSAS18001:2007. Students can obtain the credit of this course and the certificate of auditor exam through third certification organization.

description.en: Symmetrical components, unbalanced fault, generator model, stability, voltage control system, power system control,

description.zh: 二極體特性，功率電晶體之飽和特性，單象限直流馬達驅動電路,四象限直流馬達驅動電路,MOSFET馬達驅動電路。
description.en: power diode characteristics, power transister in saturationdiode. single-graduant DC motor drive,four-graduant DC motor drive,MOSFET motor drive.

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 此內容為化工程序的理論基礎，探討熱量與質量輸送之現象，以便應用於化工單元操作以及反應工程有關之計算與設計。
description.en: The course introduces the principles of the chemical process and discusses the heat and mass transport phenomena. And its application to the chemical unit operation and reaction engineering.

description.zh: 配合理論基礎、單元操作單元程序與程序控制，動態模擬之設備，瞭解實際工廠運作之情形。
description.en: A laboratory course practices the theories of the unit operation, process control and dynamic simulators.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of earth structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground improvement techniques.

description.zh: 河溪生態工法導論包含河岸保護及復育，利用植生與土壤工程的結構系統保護湖泊、河口及河川，使其免受侵蝕。因此本課程授課內容將包含測量、逕流推估、水力學、基礎土壤工程、水工構造物、植草的水道及出口、蝕溝處裡、分水工、河川及濕地復育、施工材料及以土壤工程保護邊坡並降低沖蝕量。
description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems.  The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.

name.zh: 智慧型行動電話原理與實務設計

Light Emitting Diode application and circuit design 5. Electro Luminescent application and circuit design 6. Electrostatic Discharge Characteristic and protection component 7.Integrated Circuit component package and Memory component Introduction 8. Wireless Communication network 9. Smart Mobile Phone Production Process and Test Process 10. Smart Mobile Phone Research Test Item

description.zh: 介紹嵌入式計算系統設計原理,使學生瞭解如何使用計算機軟、硬體為元件來設計嵌入式計算系統。1.嵌入式計算系統簡介2.指令集3.中央處理器4.嵌入式計算平台5.程式設計與分析6.程序與作業系統7.硬體加速器8.網路與分散式嵌入式系統9.系統設計方法
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop a comprehensive understanding of the basic concepts involving the design, development and deployment of embedded computing systems, using computing software and hardware as components. The course outline is as follows.1.An introduction to Embedded Computing System2.Instruction Sets3.CPUs4.The Embedded Computing Platform5.Program Design and Analysis6.Processes and Operating Systems7.Hardware Accelerators8.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems9.System Design Techniques

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務應用，內容將涵蓋現場改的原則與基本技術，生產流程的改善技術，現場庫存與交其改善的技術，設施佈置改善技術；降低成本的技術，目視管理的改善技術，生產效率改善技術，生產系統的改善技術等。
description.en: This course will focus on the topic of On-Job Improvement principle, production flow improvement, inventory control, facility planning, cost reduction, efficiency and production system improvement etc.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程係針對大學生授課標準研擬有關個人及企業投資及財務之管理。本課程之目的在使學生瞭解如何使相關之投資獲得良好報酬，介紹企業財務結構。企業資金分配情形。企業如何籌措資金及相關財務理論之應用。本課程研究內容包括：財務市場結構、利息因子、財務規畫及分析、股票、債券、租借問題、資金預算分配及風險性、長期借貸、有價證券等。
description.en: This course includes modern theory of business finance with emphasis on analytical and quantitative skills, treatment of firm's investment financing, dividend decisions in a valuation framework, survey of related empirical work, net present value, portfolio theory, capital asset pricing model, efficient capital markets, option theory, and effect of inflation.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis.  Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed.  It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：  1.物流管理和策略  2.運輸和配送  3.保管與包裝  4.定單處理  5.採        購  6.物料搬運  7.物流成本  8.物流服務  9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量
description.en: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.The content of the course discription:  1.Transpor totion  2.Inventory maintenance  3.Order processing   4.Purchasing   5.Warehousing & packaging  6.Materials handling  7.Logistics costs  8.Logistics customer serrice  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格2.企業環境的偵察3.策略形成4.策略執行與評估5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function innvolved in management.The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning.The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 本課程分二年（四學期）教授，在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 建築防火避難與消防設備2. 給排水衛生化糞設備3. 升降機設備系統4. 智慧型建築概論5. 垃圾處理設備6.物理環境衝擊影響評估與對策
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the second step of a series course, its content including:1. Architecture Fire Safety. Fire Escape and Fire Fighting Equipment2. Plumbing Equipment3. Elevator Equipment4. Introduction about Intelligent Building5. Refuse Treatment Equipment6. Physical Environmental Impact Assessment and Resolution.

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.具備將設計作品以數化處理與數位表達的技術與能力。3.學習建築設計三度空間模擬的動畫。4.自動化設計與輔助繪圖思考。授課內容主題包括：建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用，包括平面繪圖表現，3D模型設計表現，建築專業設計3D動畫模擬處理，自動化繪圖與自動化設計理論介紹，空間資訊系統理論與方法，設計專案的競圖表現與應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.We learn how to presentation architectural design by digital method, tools and technology.3.We learn how to simulate architectural design by animation with 3D spatial data model.4.We introduce theory about automatic architectural design and design thinking.The contents of this class is included about: introduction and application of professional soft of computer-aided architectural design, 2D's presentation of computer-aided architectural de

description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。

description.zh: 1.研討老人身心特性與生活需求特徵。2.介紹老人居住設施種類與空間機能。3.了解老人社區活動與外出行動模式。

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹生產業與服務業中之作業管理。其中包含預測、產品與服務設計、產能規劃、地點選擇規劃分析、存貨管理、及時系統與供應鏈管理、專案管理、及品質管理。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduction operation management in industry and service. It includes forecasting, product and service design, capacity planning, location selection and analysis planning, inventory management, just-in-time and supply chain management, project management, and quality management.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 今日快速變遷的工商社會環境，使個人的工作和企業的生存都遭受莫大的危機。自由意識與人權觀念的高漲亦製造出許多個人與組織（企業或政府）之間的衝突。然而如果經由適當的管理和處理得宜，危機可以變為轉機，衝突的化解可以促進互信和瞭解。本課程首先介紹學生認識危機與衝突，發生的背景，分析危機與衝突的因素和癥結，教導學生處理危機與化解衝突的技巧與智識，並以實例介紹這些技巧的運用。
description.en: The fast changing society today has created a profound crisis to the jobs of an individual and to the survival of a business. The awareness of freedom and the concept of human rights have also created the conflicts between individuals and the organization (business or government). However, if managed properly, one can turn crisis into opportunity. The resolution of conflict can improve the mutual understanding. This course will introduce the students to recognize the background of crisis and conflict, analyze their key problems, teaches students the techniques and knowledge to manage crisis and to resolve conflict. name.en: Introduction to Integration of Production Planning and Control

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動也結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。發展自動化及電子化之同時，也該就相關知識及資訊進行整合，如此方能生產規劃與現場控制之相關活動作最好之協調。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於規劃與控制之相關知識，以及進行整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore，the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for integrating production planning and shop floor control.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程是依大學課程標準訂定，適合於二技及四技學生修習有關工程投資分析與相關問題之探討。本課程之目的在尋找能使工程投資之獲利或報酬最佳化的相關方法，並介紹學生瞭解工程投資方案之本質；如何做預算分配，使得投資得到最佳報酬；工程投資環境；及投資方案之分析法。本課程包括下列主題：利率因素及通貨膨脹、稅率及匯兌之效應、資金預算分配問題、不確定性及風險性、投資方案之各種層面分析：生產、經濟、管理、環保及政治等方面。
description.en: The objective of this course is to examine the engineering investment decision problems. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, tax and exchange rate, capital budgeting, uncertainty and risk, investment projects and its relationships with production, economics, management, environment, and politics.

description.zh: 本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用孼費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個基本的商業網站， 以推廣公司業務。
description.en: This course will teach the students tolearn how to built up a commercial website .

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的應用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化、標準化、以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境。
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commercial environment. Also, by applying the business procedure reengineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程分二年（四學期）教授，在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.	cases studies

description.zh: 待補充
description.en: In this course student can understand the property of general material of buildingand the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

name.en: Introduction to History of Modern Architecture

description.zh: 待修正；本課程大致依下列階段進行：1.基本歷史背景介紹及特有名詞介紹、2.現代建築的盟芽期1850-1900、3.現代建築成長期1900-1920、4.現代建築黃金期1920-1930、5.二次大戰前現代建築概況回顧。
課程主要透過電腦圖形的表現及動畫的介紹來深入探討它們在建築上的應用,尤其是在"虛擬"及"實境"領域。利用現有之應用軟體,如AutoCAD及3DS,學生將從模型的基本建立、表現及動畫到影像的輸出或者結合多媒體應用等相關之技術。課程內容部份將會傳授並調查如何經由新的媒介來傳達我們在建築空間的認知與成果。
description.en: This course will focus on advanced technologies in the production and presentation of computer-based rendering and animation and their particular uses in relationship to architecture, both "real" and "virtual." Using 3DVIZ, students will model, render, and animate projects for output to video or for use in multimedia presentations. Readings will investigate how new media transform our perception and production of architectural space. Computer Visualization or a thorough knowledge of the fundamentals of computer modeling is prerequisites.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。

All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of solving related problems. The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics: linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory, non-linear programming, markevo chain,, wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliability, decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹組織內個人之行為以及團體間之種種管理；課程之內容大綱如下：組織行為之功能、組織行為之基礎－個人部份、組織行為之核心、組織動力學、組織行為之過程與結構。
description.en: This course introduces individual behavior in an organization and the management among the organizations. The course is consisted of functions of the organizational behavior (OB), fundamental of OB for individual, core of (OB), and processes and structure of (OB).

description.zh: 本課程整合心理學、社會學、 決策行為學等理論，介紹消費者的產品購買思維，以及產品消費行為，並討論企業如何應用消費 者行為分析的各項研究發現與理論，以提高行銷規劃與市場活動 效能。課程內容包括：1.消費購買的行為模式。2.消費行為的心理學與社會學基礎。3.消費者認知過程與心理發展。4.社會互動關係與購買行為。5.產品涉入對消費行為的影響。6.情境因素對消費行為的影響。7.態度的形成與改變。8.消費者行為分析在行銷管理的應用。學生修習本課程之後，將對行銷規劃之主要變數，如產品設計、零售企劃、廣告促銷、定價策略等，有一扎實的行為科學方面的理論基礎。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to help the student develop a good grasp of the variables that affect consumption and the implications of this knowledge for actual business decisions. Among the more specific goals, the course should improve the student's ability to: 1. Understand the sociological and psychological variables that shape the consumer decision process, 2. Identify various ways to segment a consumer market, 3. Examine the target market before making marketing-related decisions, 4. Identify new business opportunities, 5. Appreciate a variety of techniques for changing attitudes, 6. Learn how to maximize satisfaction and customer loyalty, and 7. Apply a knowledge of consumer behavior to a variety of entities ranging from non-profit organizations to e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程目的在培養學生有關產經的理論基礎，一開始將對產經學門的分析架構與演變做一介紹，之後則對各項分析理論進行解說。理論方面將包括廠商理論、獨占廠商理論、寡占廠商理論等。對於理論的應用上則使用個案研討的方式。
description.en: The industrial economics is concerned with how productive activities are brought into harmony with the demand for goods and services through some organizing mechanism.  In additions, this course will also teach the students how variations and imperfections in the organizing mechanism affect the success achieved in satisfying an economy's wants.

description.zh: 由於休閒產業與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解休業，將來就業或是對未來休閒生活都會有很大幫助。課程內包括：1.休閒產業簡介、2.休閒的經營系統、3.休閒的型式與活動、4.休閒的顧客服務。
description.en: Because the recreation industry correlation about the life, hope students will understand recreation and have much helpfulness to purse an occupation or life of recreation. The course include:1.The introduction of recreation industry.2.The working system of recreation.3.The play and style of recreation.4.The customer service of recreation.

notes: 與進二管三甲合開，本班人數上限45人

description.zh: 以實務應用的角度，幫助同學瞭解市場調查的涵義，發展及進行程序。其次以實際演練的方式，透過問卷的設計及發放，蒐集相關資料，並協助同學應用軟體，將市調所得資料進行整理、分析與解釋，最後以市場調查綜合個案報告之演練方式，以培養同學市場調查相關活動的基本概念與能力。
description.en: To help the students to know the connotation, development and procedure of marketing Research by the view of practice application.  In addition, to help the students to design and distribute the questionnaire. To collect, analysis and explain the data of market survey by using computer software.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中演算法的原理、分析與設計策略，使學生了解各種演算法的設計，訓練如何分析解決實際的問題，以便學生可以設計有效率的電腦演算法程式，進而了解問題的難易，增加實作演算法能力。課程內容包括學習分析一個演算法的複雜度與界定一個問題難度的下界，並完整介紹整套NP-completeness計算理論。其中關於解決問題所使用的有效技巧，課程中將介紹一般常用的「貪婪法」、「各個擊破法」、「樹狀搜尋法」、「修剪與搜尋」、與「動態規劃法」及其它主題。同時課程中也將簡介演算法新的發展方向，包括「近似演算法」、「攤還分析」、「隨機演算法」、「線上演算法」等概念。最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，以了解近代演算法的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Mathematical background、Basic analysis techniques、Computational complexities、Worst case analysis and average case analysis、Basic Design Paradigms、Divide and conquer、Greedy methods、Dynamic programming、Probabilistic algorithms、Computational Complexity、Linear reduction of problems、NP-completeness。

name.zh: 電源管理積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練培養學生具有設計電源管理積體電路的能力，內容包含：1. 介紹 2. 線性穩壓器 3. 震盪器 4. 運算放大器 5. 參考電路 6. 直流-交流電源轉換 7. 同步整流電路 8. 電流感測電路 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the students to own the design capability of power management IC. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Linear Regulator 3. Oscillator 4. Operational amplifiers 5.Reference circuits 6. DC-DC conversion 7. Synchronous-Rectified circuit 8. Current sensing circuits 9. Case study

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

They include manufacturing methods of; fibrous web filament web wet method; physically bonded, chemically bonded or methods; lamination among the film, woven, knitted and Non-woven fabrics; use of fine and superfine particle in Non-woven industry; Printing and Finishing for Non-woven; use of Non-woven in electronics aerospace, medical materials and artificial leather..…etc.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 逆向工程已成為電腦輔助產品開發技術重要的一環，透過三次元量測或掃瞄技術，取得工件表面的點資料，據以建構3D CAD幾何模型(Geometric model)，以供後續設計、電腦輔助工程分析(CAE)與電腦輔助製造(CAM)之應用。逆向工程的程序分為三個階段：(1)擷取工件表面的點資料；(2)點資料的前置處理；以及(3)建構或更新幾何模型。依此流程，本課程首先講述各類運用於逆向工程中的量測與掃瞄技術，並以設計應用觀點為基礎，討論其間的差異與優缺點，隨著運用領域的不同，而採取不同的量測技術；其次介紹點資料前置處理的理念與方法，從現有文獻中，解析的相關的技術，因量測技術與策略的差異，而發展出不同的處理技術；至於，重建或更新原有的幾何模型的部分，將著重設計實務的應用，並與現有的CAD系統整合的策略。課程之目標，為使修習本課程之學生能對逆向工程的相關理論與技術，有全盤的認識與瞭解，並透過實際案例的操作，訓練學生能具備實務作業能力。
description.en: Reverse engineering has become an important tool for geometric model construction in 3D CAD based on the data points, digitized from an existing part, for the downstream applications such as CAE and CAM. The process of reverse engineering can usually be subdivided into three stages, i.e. (1) part digitization for capturing the data points; (2) data point pre-processing; and (3) CAD modeling and/or updating. In this course, the relevant techniques in the three stages of reverse engineering procedure are introduced firstly. Through the project practice, the student is able to adept to the techniques of reverse engineering.

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

name.en: Statistics for environmental engineers & experimental design

description.zh: 本課程之目的，在於利用統計學之理論及方式，處理及分析環境領域實驗數據，含基本理論、線性迴歸等。並進一步利用此原理，作實驗中參數簡化對實驗結果之影響，並討論簡化後其參數「相關性」（intercorrelation）之問題，期以最短之實驗時間，得到最佳之實驗效果 本課程之主要講述大綱為1.基本統計學原理及統計學在環境領域之應用2.迴歸分析及統計軟體應用3.模廠實驗之參數及其變化（level）之選擇4.	階乘實驗設計（Factorial design at two levels）5.階乘實驗設計之簡化（Fractional Factorial design at two levels）6.分析階乘實驗設計之結果（Analysis of half-fraction design）
description.en: The goals of this class are to utilize the methodology of the statistics to analyze the data generated in environmental area.  In addition, basic ideas of experimental design with applications, completely randomized design, randomized block design, estimation and tests, analysis of covariance for designed experiments; factorial experiments and determination of optimum factor combinations are also discussed in this class.

The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a inter92tive media design project.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 新聘老師(1月中左右確認師長) 曾垂紀1.5

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在探討電子商務與行動商務的技術、管理與應用，課程內容包含企業e化概論、電子商務概論、B2C商務、B2B商務、電子付款、無線通訊技術、行動裝置應用、行動計算、行動商務、無所不在的運算、資訊安全等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and applications of electronic commerce and mobile commerce. The topics include e-business overview, e-commerce overview, B2C commerce, B2B commerce, e-payments, wireless technology, mobile access, mobile computing, mobile commerce, pervasive computing, security, and so forth.

description.zh: 資訊科技日新月益。現今資訊科技系統已成為企業中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹使用更新進的資訊科技所產生資訊系統的進步。本課程的組成包括以下四類的介紹：一、資訊科技系統的介紹；二、結合RFID應用的資訊系統；三、結合行動裝置的資訊系統；四、雲端應用的資訊系統。
description.en: The information technology advances rapidly. Now, the information technology system has become an essential part of enterprises. The goal of the course is breadth to cover advances in information systems, with emphasis on enabling technologies. The content of this course is composed of the following four parts. In Part 1, the information technology systems are explained. Part 2 covers the information systems with RFID applications. Part 3 covers the information systems with mobile devices. Finally, Part 4 covers cloud information systems.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 一下必修(三選二課程)曾垂紀老師1.5

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI與企業資源規劃、BI與電子商務、BI與顧客關係管理等議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，EMBA班學生可以討論其熟悉產業之KPI，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: Business intelligence (BI) is a business management term which refers to applications and technologies which are used to gather, provide access to, and analyze data and information about their company operations. Business intelligence systems can help companies have a more comprehensive knowledge of the factors affecting their business, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and they can help companies to make better business decisions. In this course, shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques, such as RFID, will be introduced firstly. Database and data warehouse concepts will also be mentioned. Applications of BI in ERP, EC and CRM will be the important focus of this course. Students will have a chance to implement BI software based on his business-related data in this course.

name.zh: 產業政策與企業優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Industry Policy and Business Betterment

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，政府需訂定各項政策來因應潮流之變化並輔導產業更具競爭力。本課程將使EMBA學生了解政府相關產業政策，並透過一些成功案例探討製造業服務化、服務業科技化與國際化及傳統產業特色化等相關技術及對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, government often tries to assist industries to boost their competitiveness with various public policies. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest industrial policy plans and potential benefits on encompassing the creation of a service-oriented manufacturing industry, an internationalized and high-tech services industry and a specialty-oriented traditional industry. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises. Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。

The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: 一下必修(三選二之一的課程)

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生瞭解服務特性、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務創新和策略等，期望公司未來能成為卓越經營之企業。 課程內容包含服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Service management and innovation is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept, Service delivery system, Service quality, Service strategy, Service innovation, Customer satisfaction, and Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於將個體經濟學相關理論引用至企業管理決策上。討論主題包括供給與需求理論、市場需求預測、廠商理論、成本利潤分析、市場結構、定價策略與競爭者分析等議題。希望同學修習本課程後，更能瞭解如何利用經濟分析工具，更加精準並有效率地解決實務上所面臨的重要經營管理議題。
description.en: The course covers microeconomic concepts relevant to managerial decision-making. Topics include demand and supply analysis, consumer demand forecasting, production and cost analysis, market structure, pricing policies and competitor analysis. This course will help students to have a better understanding of the economic tools and their potential use for solving real-world problems.

name.zh: 顧客行為與互動行銷決策

description.zh: 顧客會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓顧客認同。這表示，「與顧客的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和顧客直接對話的空間。 這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以顧客行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Customer buying behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, customer buying behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以品牌理論來探討品牌行銷策略的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含品牌特性、品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、品牌策略。身為公司品牌經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The nature of brand, brand marketing, brand competition, brand strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Equilibrium, Aera and Mass, Momemts of Inertia, Analysis of Structures of Virtual Work.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

name.en: Special Topics of Universal Design in Furniture

description.zh: 全適化設計在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足每一個使用者的需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認全適化設計思維方法與實務，本課程著重於全適化設計理論在家具設計上的應用。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 人機境互動設計專題係使用者、產品、環境彼此之間互動作用為主題，思考其介面設計，產品語言和溝通之脈絡。透過理論、案例、實作，驗證產品創新方法。
description.en: Human-Machine-Environment interaction design is a field in which designers discover and respond to people's spoken and unspoken needs through analyzing physical, cognitive, social, and cultural human factors. These factors reveal human needs and activities in an effort to create products, messages, services, and systems that fit people's lifestyles. Human-centered design employs methods including behavioral observation, prototyping, and systems design.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程之重點在於將熱力學機基本定律,應用於較為實際的化工問題上.主要內容包括:熱力學及輸送現象性質之估算方法,氣液相平衡及液液相平衡在分離製程的應用等.
description.en: The objectives of this course are to apply principles of thermodynamics in practical chemical processes. The contents of the curricula are 1) estimation of the thermodynamic and transport properties of fluids and solids, 2) vapor-liquid equilibrium as well as liquid-liquid equilibrium for separation processes application.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷基本特性如晶體結構、固態化學及其物理性質、微結構行為等，並藉由陶瓷的機械性、熱學性質、磁學性質、光學性質、導電性等特質應用於一般工業材料上。
description.en: Ceramic material is concerned with understanding the development, use, and control of the properties of ceramics from the point of view of theories and practices. It involves: characteristics of ceramics, crystals, glass,defects, interfaces, phase diagrams, phase transformation, glass-ceramics, solids reactions, sintering, vitrification, thermal properties, optical properties, elasticity, strength, thermal stress, electrical conductivity, dielectric properties, magnetic properties, etc..

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

notes: 新聘(劉建中)1時數,請進修部安排億光大樓教室

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 工業機器人概論，基礎理論分析：運動學，動力學，控制等，機器人之設計程序，機器人在彈性裝配與製造系統之應用分析與系統設計，智慧型機器人，個案研究等 。
description.en: Introduction to industrial robot, Fundamental theory of robot: kinematics, dynamics, and control etc., Robot design process, Application to flexible assembly and manufacturing system, Introduction to intelligent robot, Case study, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

description.zh: 1.建築管理行政體系及法源介紹。2.建築管理之對象人、事、物介紹。3.建築許可之申請、審核、核發、列管及追蹤作業。4.建築物之施工管理及工程糾紛處理。5.建築物使用與變更使用之管理。6.建築物昇降設備管理制度介紹。7.建築物違章之查報與拆除。8.建築物公共安全檢查法律依據及作業程序。9.建築管理的發展方向。10.建築師及營造業管理之基本概念及未來之工作方向。
description.en: 1.	Introducing the hierarchical of building department and government administration rules of the building.2.	Introducing administrative terms of building with owner, designer or supervisor of building, construction work, building site, and building itself.3.	Application procedure for a building permit, include application, judgement, approbation, management and audit.4.	Administration for Building construction and construction dispute intermediation.5.	Administration for building occupancy and alterations.6.	Introducing administration of building elevator facilities.7.	Illegal building administration and dismantling.8.	Inspection procedure for building safety and procedure rules.9.	The development direction of building administration.10.	The basic concept and executive direction in the future for administration of Architect and construction.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在於讓研究所學生就建築構造與施工學們有進階性之認識、探討與操作。故包含講義授課、校外專家專業分享(結合雙師計畫)、實務課題分組操作等進行方式。廣義之建築構造應包含:建築材料應用、建築構法原理、設計與介面整合、建築生產與管理等面向，故本課程以上述關鍵詞進行為期十八周的訓練。期望訓練研究生具有獨立專業思考、整合技術、發掘現場課題、創出新生產手法之能力。
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality. This course contents: Introduction of contemporary System Theory Divide and unify of building systems Concepts and methods of System Integration Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

name.en: An introduction to sustainable architectural research

description.zh: 本課程主要係針對全球化與國際化時代來臨後，身為地球村的一份子如何整合因對永續建築與環境不同價值觀所帶來之衝擊，並透過客觀研究與實際案例具體提出適切的解決之道，以取得永續建築與環境所存在異同之平衡。課程期望透過引導並激發研究者在面對永續建築與環境之種種議題時，能夠同時尋求人類與建築以及環境三者間共存共榮之最適當方式。學習過程中，研究者除必需提出理論與實務案例做為研究之基礎外，傳授者同時亦將由研究討論過程中了解研究者個別之特質，並依照其不同特質協助研究者建立正確的邏輯思維，以建立建築專業道德與卓越價值觀，以期確實能夠使研究者在精確掌握時代趨勢的前提下，提出符合建築專業研究對於永續建築與環境兩者異同平衡之解決策略與妥善建議，並期望藉由研究能夠更進一步獲得社會對於建築專業研究之認同，最終達到永續建築與環境平衡之目標。
description.en: This course targeting mainly after the era of globalization and internationalization, who is a member of the global village how to integration for sustainable construction and environmental impact of the different values, and through objective research and the case specifying the appropriate solutions, in order to achieve sustainable architectural and environmental similarities and differences that exist in balance. name.zh: 經典文學作品創意教學

description.zh: 本課程主旨在向各級學校的英語師資，或對西洋文學文化有興趣的社會人士，推薦英美文學經典作品作為創意教學的教材藍本，兼具創意教學此一領域的理論介紹與創作實務。學員們藉由對英美經典文學作品與其相關之多媒體文化產物的研讀和探索，激起反應、反省與靈感，進而以英文創作作為回饋，朝向創意產業邁進。本課程設計的目標在激發學員多方面的能力：（1）瞭解英美經典文學作品的文字之美與文化意涵、（2）用英語表達的習慣、（3）用英文創作的潛能、以及（4）進入英語文化創意產業的準備。
description.en: This course introduces English literary cannons as the basis for teaching creativity and the related theories and practices. Students will be exploring a series of multimedia and cultural products created based on English literary cannons and in terms creating their own works. Students of this course are expected to develop in these four aspects: 1. Understanding English literary cannons and their cultural implications; 2. Expressing oneself well in the English language; 3. Creating in the English language; 4. Equipping for the English cultural and literary creative industry.

description.zh: 本課程旨於培訓職場專業英文教學師資, 以因應在未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之趨勢。在一般普通英文教師需求已近飽合的現況且對專業英文教學的新需求潮流下,建構新的專業用途英語教學內容及方法為本課程之宗旨及目標。本所應用語言組課程之主軸為以應用語言學為導向之專業英語研究及應用的人才,除培養專業英文應用能力以期研究所畢業生在業界專業領域中以優勢英語文能力為基礎,厚植專業發展潛能。而針對未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之需求,以專業英文研究為基礎輔以強化ESP課程設計及課堂教學法，方能成功轉換普通英文教師角色至ESP/EPP教學。畢業生未來可於大學,政府部門,私人企業,及專門提供專業英文教學機構中,從事專業英文職前及在職英文訓練教師。
description.en: When it comes to ESL/EFL teaching and learning, traditional teaching methodology has its major emphasis on theories of teaching and learning general English.  Methods and approaches in the ESL/EFL classrooms, material implementation, course design and assessment do not meet the demands in the fast-growing market for function-specific professional English teaching personnel. While the pedagogical courses acknowledges the importance and necessity of preparing students with the ESL / EFL teaching basics, it is particularly our mission to expand the ESL /EFL horizon into a new realm of ESP/EPP-specific teaching contexts with the necessary tools, resources, and techniques in implementing ESP/ EPP courses. Quarrying out knowledge from both English pedagogy and ESP / EPP theories and applications, students are prepared to establish the tailor-developed ESP / EPP programs for specific industries and corporations for pre-career training and in-job trainings as well.
