description.zh: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識、瞭解真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式。關乎創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學，探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。
description.en: This course aims to meet the needs of advanced learners of English who are in the pursuit of near-native knowledge and understanding of English lexical use in real-world communication. Lexical pragmatics concerns itself with the creative and at the same time mainstream, re-occurring patterns of lexical variations. The recent rapidly growing area of lexical pragmatics explores lexical dynamics as well as their underpinning rhetorical functions, such as phenomena of meaning narrowing, expansion, evolution, deviation, modification, etc.

name.zh: 透過文學與電影教授文化知識
name.en: Teaching Cultural Literacy through Literature and Film

description.zh: 識字指一個人的讀寫能力。然而，文化知識指一個人對某一個文化所具備的基本知識，並且能藉此類知識與他人就該文化的內容進行交談的能力。此類知識內容包括文化知識分子所熟知的歷史、藝術、與習慣。本課程聚焦於文化根本元素之一的文學，藉由研討若干西方文學所不可或缺之基本文本、作者、及想法，探究具備西方文學與文化修養的意義為何。
description.en: Literacy refers to an individual’s basic ability to read and write. Cultural literacy, however, refers to an individual’s basic knowledge about a culture – about the history, the art, and the practices which an educated member of that culture would have knowledge of and which allow him to participate in conversations with others about the culture. Focusing on literature, one fundamental element of culture, asking what it means to be literate about Western literature, this course examines some of the basic texts, authors, and ideas in Western culture that are essential to the teaching and the study of literature.

description.zh: 本課程探討語言評量原則與方法以及相關重要課題。涵蓋之主題包括：語言評量原則；語言測驗設計；說、聽、讀、寫語言能力評量；替代、真實評量〈如學習歷程檔案評量法〉；語言評量研究法。
description.en: This course examines principles of and major approaches to language assessment and current issues in the field. The main topics include the following: principles of language assessment, designing language tests, approaches to assessing language skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing), alternative, authentic assessment (portfolios, conferences, observations, peer assessments, self assessments), and conducting research in classroom-based assessment.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。本課程亦將論及禪學觀念與管理的關聯性，提供學生一個東方觀點的管理藝術，幫助學生瞭解禪在企業管理應用的基本理念與價值；將禪的卓越智慧運用於公司的治理決策。學生們將被要求從事一項對目前工商界中具企業倫理公司治理的調查分析與評論。
description.en: This course discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity). This course will also discuss the relations between Zen and management. It introduces the Eastern management art to the students helping them understand how the concept and values of Zen can assist the decision-making in corporate governance.

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。
description.en: 1.History and paradigm of programming languages 2.Design principles of programming languages 3.Syntex and semantics 4.Data types 5.Control structures 6. Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

description.zh: 課程從統計模式(迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統軟體設計實務

description.zh: 本課程將提供系上學生兼具實務與理論之課程特色及專業實務訓練，以強化本系學生對於嵌入式系統軟硬體技術的認識與實作能力，其內容包括： （１）嵌入式系統開發環境建置 （２）嵌入式作業系統與各種自由軟體授權模式簡介 （３） UML於嵌入式軟體工程應用與CMMI標準（４）開放源碼之圖形化介面函式庫與視覺處理函示庫（５）智慧型手持行動裝置 （6）異質多核心平台之開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with design methodologies, tools, and implementation practices of embedded software design. Its topics include: 1. Embedded System Development Platform and Tool-chains. 2. Embedded Operating Systems and Open Source Software Engineering.  3. UML for Embedded Software Engineering and CMMI. 4. Developing Embedded Software Using Opensource GUI and Computer Vision Libraries. 5. Embedded Mobile Devices. 6. Heterogeneous Multi-core Embedded Platforms.

description.zh: 一、教學目標： 簡介綠建築、永續都市之各項子議題，現階段專業界對本課題之解決概念及手法，並引介綠建築、永續都市規劃設計案例。二、教學內容：1.思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。2.綠建築、永續都市之內容。3. 引介綠建築、永續都市規劃設計案例。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the green buildings and sustainable cities. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 透過理論及實務配合講解，並輔以實例觀察，課程以能源經濟理論為講授架構，講解能源經濟之特性及型態，並介紹我國能源政策訂訂原則及內涵，以使學生能對能源產業及能源政策有整體性瞭解，讓學生得以學以應用，為以後升學、就業或進入政府部門服務奠下良好基礎。
description.en: This course is to teach the theory of energy economic and strategy. Through the lecture of theory and real case study, students can learn the characteristics and type of energy industry and the principles and contents of energy strategy. Students can understand the energy market and energy strategy for studying in the graduate school, entering companies, and servicing for the government department.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election. description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 能源工程主要為介紹現有能源供應系統包含熱能及電能，上課的內容為包含熱流原理導論及再生能源、傳統火力電廠與汽電共生系統的系統原理介紹。
description.en: The concepts of thermal energy and electrical energy will be included in the Energy Engineering; the different energy system which will be introduced is as follows: renewable energy, traditional thermal power plant and cogeneration power system.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 從設計產業經營之立足點探討經典服務理論如：服務品質、服務設計與服務體驗工程（S.E.E.）之應用與實踐。授課內容側重於基礎服務理論與最新服務科學方法的介紹，並選擇特定服務產業進行實務研習對象。課程預計以主題講授、專家座談、分組研習方式進行，並分三期評量服務研習成果。
description.en: The course aims at the training of applying prominent service theories and methods such as Service Quality, Service Design, Service Experience Engineering (S.E.E.) to the management of design service. It proceeds in the forms of topics lecturing, professional speeches and groups study. The result of study is evaluated in three stages accordingly.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。感測器與驅動器簡介，資料傳輸方法，物理式感測器與驅動器：聲動式，磁式性，壓電式，電力式，電磁式，熱電式，熱阻式，光導式，光發射式，光電式。化學式感測器與驅動器：化學與氣體感測器,生醫感測器與生物晶片
description.en: Introduction to sensors and actuators, data transmission methods, physics based sensors and actuators：sonic, magnetic, piezoelectric, electrical, electromagnetic, thermoelectric, thermoresistive, photoconductive, photoemissive, photovoltaic; chemistry based sensors and actuators：chemical and gas sensors, bio-medical sensors and biochips.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹各式多媒體軟體應用，以Flash動畫軟體為主，輔以不同軟體於機械工程上如︰實習、實驗及機構等之應用實例；使機械系的學生了解多媒體製作，進而發揮其創意及設計能力，將實務及構想以動畫之方式展現。
description.en: Introduce various multimedia application program, Use FLASH software, associated with related animation software, to behave Mechanical Engineering significance, such as courses of experiment practice and mechanism etc, This course will let student understand how the Multimedia be produced, develop their design capability as well as invention, and perform the practice and configuration by animation.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。科技管理是一門結合科技、商事及法律的課程。主要是希望透過資訊科技相關基礎知識，以整合組織內部資源，提升組織對於科技運籌帷幄的能力，進而達成組織最終目的。相較於傳統的MBA，科管所除了必須具備一般的管理知識外，更著重在於高科技產業方面相關專業知識的強化。
description.en: This is a course combining Technology, commerce and law. It aims to integrate the resources of the organization via information technology and raise the competitiveness. Comparing with MBA, except the courses of general knowledge management, Technology and Innovation Management put more emphasizes on the professional knowledge of hi-tech and related industries.

description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」

With an introduction to the fundamental principles and the financial planning process, this course emphasizes on the provision of investment advisory services. It discusses client expectations and concerns including risk and other cognitive issues before applying the concepts and techniques to construct and manage investment portfolios for the client.In addition, this course incorporates other wealth management issues including consumption planning, asset acquisition and retirement planning in designing a financial plan.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers，Design of sensing element , Signal Conditioning Circuit Design，Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor， Fabrication of sensor，Selection and Application of the sensors.。

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理、化學。1. 醫學工程的領域與定義 2. 生醫訊號的介紹 3. 量測用醫療儀器的介紹 4. 生醫系統的介紹 5. 生醫材料的介紹 6. 臨床工程應用的介紹 7. 生醫感測器的介紹
description.en: 1. What is biomedical engineering? 2. Introduction of biosignals 3. Introduction of bioinstrumentation  4. Introduction of biomechanical systems 5. Introduction of biomaterials 6. Introduction of clinical engineering7. Introduction of biosensor

notes: 進修部與進修學院合開

description.zh: 先修課程：3001016或負責教授同意。介紹雷射加工設備、雷射切割、雷射銲接、雷射表面處理及加工時之安全要項。
description.en: Introduction to laser machining device, laser cutting, laser welding, laser surface treatment and the safety items during laser machine operation.

notes: 進修部與進修學院合開

description.zh: 本課程透過課堂演講，以講授最新管理知識或各產業之最新熱門管理議題，並透過學生分組研討使學生進一步瞭解經營管理的最新發展與趨勢。
description.en: This course focuses on lecturing, seminar, group study, and training of students' broad vision about the newly development and future trend of business management.

description.zh: 介紹成本觀念與成本會計資訊系統，成本彙集程序，材料與人工規畫與控制，製造費用之規畫，差異分析，部門化會計處理及責任會計與報告。修畢本課程後能瞭解製造業之成本流程，材料、人工及製造費用之規畫與控制，責任會計與報告，因而具備了控制成本，提高效率之管理能力。
description.en: In this course, the following topics will be covered as 1) the concept of cost, 2) the accounting Information system, 3) Cost analysis 4) Cost Center and 5) Case study

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程以1950年代以後的西方文學為本，以當代文化批評理論作為分析基礎，如互文性、族群研究、（後）殖民主義、魔幻寫實主義、女性主義、傷痕記憶等。課程討論重點概念將包括論述、再現、心理分析、後結構主義、後現代主義等。
description.en: This course is designed to initiate students to the vast field of contemporary literature after the 1950s.  Important works originally written in English (with a few translated into English from European languages) are introduced and arranged roughly in chronological order and also in terms of literary critical concepts such as intertexuality, from late modernism to the postmodernism proper, ethnic studies and (post) colonialism, magic realism, feminism, and trauma.  It is believed that literary works are cultural texts in general; hence they are best approached by cultural theories. Students will be exposed, therefore, to concepts and issues within the field such as discourse, representation, psychoanalysis, poststructuralism, and deconstructionism.

description.zh: 本課程是科技專利取得與攻防的進階課程，目的是以創新思維及案例討論方式，幫助學生熟悉創新管理相關能力。商品化是將構想、創意、創新及新發現轉化成為有市場價值的產品或服務，而為企業增加競爭力的過程，本系學生擁有從事研發與創業者最需要的專利知識。許多創意點子如果有本專題課程系統化收集，它就成為校園創新的主要來源，而透過校園創新的多元面向，如技術創新，專利取得，資訊情報收集等，均可為學生能力帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程將會輔導學生將其創新發想取得專利，並輔導其加入國科會或教育部主辦的創新創業比賽，或未來發展創業的可能。
description.en: This is an advanced course in Patent Application and Protection. The objective is to help students become familiar with innovation and Commercialization through innovation project. Commercialization is a process that translates the ideas, creativity, innovation and new findings into a marketable product or service. It increases the competitiveness of the campus and engaged in R & D and entrepreneurs are most in need of knowledge. There are many good ideas happened, if we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to students and rises its competing ability. From "Patent Application and Protection" classes, we find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise or assistant students to participate the competition held by NSC an

name.en: Smart interaction interface of living space

description.zh: 互動科技與遍佈運算技術促使建築空間成為整合媒體資訊中介界面。課程目標在利用數位資訊科技以設計使用者為中心、服務導向，敏感、回應與協調的居住環境，促使學習者多重思考未來居住空間之規劃設計可能性，與掌握相關技術。教學除專業課程，與產、官、學研究性、實務利用性的專業講題、個案研討，並輔以報告作品小組討論為評量方式。
description.en: Interaction technology and ubiquitous computing reform architectural space to an integrated media-information interface. The course objectives are to promote students to think planning of the future living space, and designing of a user-centered, service-oriented, sensitive, reflective, coordinated environment by digital interaction technology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students’ reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源，致動器，控制元件及迴路,傳送,配管, 維護與安全。
description.en: Introduction of Pneumatic, Pneumatic elements Instruction, Electrical Parts for Pneumatic Control, Pneumatic Basic control circuit, Pneumatic Application control Circuit, Introduction of Hydraulic, Hydraulic control Element Instruction, Electrical Parts for Hydraulic Control, Hydraulic Basic Control Circuit, Hydraulic Application Control Circuit, and Pneumatic and Hydraulic Trouble Shooting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.
